summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of North and West 74th Street, from Greenwood Avenue to 3rd Avenue Northwest; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7176 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
